This library depends on or is derived from the
following softwares. If you want to use the features
of this library, you must also follow the
library licenses.


# breploader, cm_lib, sa_lib, ps_session
Femtet License
This library depends on the extension libraries of Femtet.
These features requires a valid Femtet license.
Further information, see <femtet_exe_dir>/lib/LICENSE.txt


# coincidence_matching, set_attributes, brepmatching
MIT License
https://github.com/deGravity/brepmatching
Part of this library is derived from brepmatching (by deGravity).


# automate
MIT License
https://github.com/deGravity/automate
Part of this library is derived from automate (by deGravity).


# Eigen3
MPL2 License
license: https://gitlab.com/libeigen/eigen/-/blob/master/COPYING.MPL2?ref_type=heads
source: https://gitlab.com/libeigen/eigen/-/blob/master/
documentation: https://eigen.tuxfamily.org/index.php
This library includes an unmodified version of Eigen3 (3.4.0).
